bias_origin_verdict.explanation: Bias primarily manifests in the model's predictions. Fairness violations: demographic_parity, equal_opportunity, equalized_odds. Counterfactual sensitivity detected. The data and features may be relatively unbiased, but the model has learned to make discriminatory predictions.

Features: Remove or regularize proxy features for 'gender': gender__Male, gender__Female, income_scaled
Remove or regularize proxy features for 'race': race__White
Model: Consider threshold calibration per subgroup to reduce acceptance rate gaps.
Apply fairness-aware training methods or constraints to equalize TPR across groups.
Use post-processing techniques to equalize both TPR and FPR across groups.
Model predictions are sensitive to sensitive attributes. Consider removing these features or using fairness constraints.
